title: Latest updates: Leicestershire Live on Friday 17 March 2017 - BBC News
summary: leicester city to face atletico madrid in champions league .
leicester city defender to miss rest of season .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 monday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's all from leicestershire local live this week - updates will start again on monday at 08:00 .

documents.title: man jailed for distributing naked image of ex-girlfriend
text: a man who sent a naked of his ex-girlfriend to her family and a friend has been jailed , leicestershire police said .
ryan crookes , of melton road , thurmaston , was sentenced today to 18 months after previously pleading guilty to one count of disclosing a private sexual photograph with intent to cause distress .

the 19-year-old also pleaded guilty to one count of making an indecent photograph and sexual activity with a girl , the same victim , who he began a sexual relationship with when she was 15 years old .
and he admitted a further count of sexual activity with a second 15-year-old girl .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: donations flood in for family of policeman
text: the crowdfunding page for the family of policeman austin jackson , who died while on duty , has now reached £ 5,500 - that 's more than five times the original target .
the person who set up the page `` a fellow officer '' has written on the page that they are `` absolutely overwhelmed '' by the support and that it shows how well thought of pc jackson was .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : a few sunny spells on saturday
text: it will stay cloudy overnight with some hill fog and patchy outbreaks of rain .
remaining mild - a minimum temperature of 7c ( 45f ) .
saturday will be a breezy day , with a few sunny spells but also the risk of a shower .
a maximum temperature of 13c ( 55f ) .
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: watch : motherhood challenges for netball coach
text: being a working parent can be difficult at times - but imagine doing it when you 're the coach for one of the country 's top netball teams .
karen atkinson mbe is the head coach of superleague team loughborough lightning has been been talking about juggling a baby with netball practice
warning : third party content may contain adverts .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : two lanes closed on m6
text: long queues towards junction 2 ( m69 ) from junction 1 ( a426 ) on ther m6 .
2 lanes closed after an accident
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: bank closed in enderby after money stolen
text: barclays bank at enderby is closed - leicestershire police say a g4s security man was attacked and money stolen .
author: Simon Ward
East Midlands Today Reporter

documents.title: two charged over death of leicestershire woman
text: two people have been charged with causing the death of a leicestershire woman by dangerous driving in essex .
laura cooper was a passenger in a car that was involved in a collision with a lorry on the m25 in waltham abbey in march last year .
another passenger in the car was also injured .
a 62-year-old lorry driver from telford was charged with causing death by dangerous driving and causing serious injury by dangerous driving .
a 32-year-old woman from london was charged with the same offences as well as causing death by careless driving while with a proportion of a specified controlled drug above the specified limit .
both are due to appear at chelmsford magistrates ' court on 12 april .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : three-vehicle crash in belgrave
text: three vehicles involved in an incident and partially blocking a lane of watermead way coming from melton road and troon way
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: st patrick 's day celebrations in leicester
text: it looks like you do n't have to be in ireland to celebrate st patrick 's day
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: thousands raised for family of policeman
text: a crowdfunding page set up to raise money for the family of a leicestershire policeman who died while on duty yesterday has raised more than £ 4,200 .
a `` fellow officer '' set up the online fundraiser with the aim of raising £ 1,000 to support the family of pc austin jackson ( right ) .

talking about the death of the 38-year-old officer , chief constable simon cole said : `` austin was always a professional and well-liked police officer who embedded himself in the st matthew 's community.‎
`` he will be missed by his colleagues in the force , and i send my deepest condolences to his family . ''
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : seagulls in empingham
text: the seagulls seem to have taken a shine to this seed-driller in empingham this morning
andy 's rutland said it was a chilly and cloudy start to the day .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: foxes boss on champions league opponents
text: facing a team who have reached the final in two of the last three seasons is a massive challenge but it 's just the kind of tie you expect in the quarter-finals of the champions league .
atletico madrid are a very good team with some fantastic individuals with experience in the competition , but we 'll be ready to give everything to progress .

it will be a brilliant occasion for our supporters and for everyone at the club but , before the players can begin to think about these games , we have premier league matches to come that are of huge significance to our season .
they will be our sole focus . ''
author: Leicester City

documents.title: horse 's head gift from spanish football club
text: when leicester city last met atletico madrid , the visitors presented the club with this miniature horse 's head
these days it 's kept in one of the club historian 's many store rooms packed with memorabilia .
i wonder what they 'll bring this time
author: Mike McCarthy
BBC Radio Leicester Sport

documents.title: afternoon weather update
text: cloudy throughout the afternoon with some showers arriving bringing light rain for a time .
increasingly breezy as the afternoon goes by with top temperatures of 9c ( 48f ) .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: tigers name starting side
text: this will be the leicester tigers team to face exeter in the anglo-welsh cup final on sunday
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: flashback to 1997 : controversy in the uefa cup
text: club historian john hutchinson revisits leicester city 's controversial exit from the uefa cup at the hands of atletico madrid
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: shepshed vehicle death : police appeal to find two runners
text: police conducting a murder investigation into the death of a man in shepshed are trying to find two men seen running from the scene .
the man was found dying in a car in an industrial estate off gelders hall road just before 21:00 last night .
two men were seen running from the area at around the same time .
it 's of critical importance that we trace these two people .
pedestrians and motorists using gelders hall road between 20:00 and 21:00 last night may have seen two men running along the road .
it 's possible the men may have attempted to hitch a lift from a passing motorist .
if anyone saw them , or anything else which they thought seemed unusual or sus i need to hear from them . ''
a post-mortem examination is expected to be carried out later today .
a 22-year old man , from coalville , who was arrested last night remains in police custody .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: champions league draw : dates for atletico v leicester
text: some dates for your diary
the first leg of the quarter-final will be in madrid on wednesday 12 april , while the return leg at the king power stadium is set for tuesday 18 april .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: chief football writer : home second leg 'important '
text: leicester city may have missed one of the accepted giants , but it 's still a fantastic tie - and still leicester city in the champions league quarter-finals .
leicester have the second leg at the king power stadium .
anyone who was there on tuesday night will know the importance of that .
author: Phil McNulty
BBC Sport chief football writer at Wembley

documents.title: your comments : foxes to play atletico madrid
text: there have been lots of comments from you on the champions league draw .
peter wisdish said : `` happy with that , let 's get our own back . ''
mark kettell said : `` away for first leg , then back to the king power .
come on leicester , we can do this . ''
david tanser said : `` they say revenge is best served cold - 20 years should do it '' .
author: Facebook

documents.title: atletico 'wo n't like ' foxes style of play
text: winnable ?
that was my first reaction .
that and revenge following the clubs ' meeting in 1997 .
ian marshall 's goal and then the refereeing performance of remi harrel who sent off gary parker for the return leg with the game in the balance .
as i recall he did n't referee after that one .
i was in the crowd that night and felt sick afterwards .
it 's a winnable tie - atletico are fourth in la liga and wo n't like the foxes style of play .
they 'll have seen how they dispatched sevilla and wo n't be looking forward to jamie vardy running at them .
wishful thinking maybe , but it 's a good draw for city .
the dream continues .
revenge 20 years on ?
yes please .
author: Ian Stringer
BBC Radio Leicester Foxes commentator

documents.title: teams reunited 20 years on
text: leicester 's tie is a repeat of a uefa cup tie from the 1997-98 season , which atletico won .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: somali community appeal for help
text: leicester 's somali community is asking for help to support people at risk of famine in africa .
it comes days after the disasters emergency committee launched an appeal to try to help the 16 million who are facing starvation across the eastern side of the continent .
an organisation helping somalis to settle here in leicester has .
organised a fundraising event in the city tomorrow .
abdi farah from socopa told the bbc this morning she finds herself waking up in the night worrying about her family in somalia .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingfoxes to play atletico madrid in champions league
text: leicester city have been drawn to play the spanish side atletico madrid in the quarter-finals of the champions league .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch live : champions league quarter-final draw
text: watch live : champions league quarter-final draw
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: office excitement for champions league draw
text: when you 're that excited you have to wear your leicester city shirt to the office
is it champions league draw day jason bourne ?
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: christmas day in leicester for football fans
text: today is like having christmas day as a kid only for mum and dad to say : `` hope you enjoyed those presents , we 're all off to the airport to fly to lapland and see santa , he has twice as many gifts for you . ''
a far cry from the piece of coal and tangerine we 're used to on december 25th following the foxes .
our airwaves have been full of pre-draw predictions - juventus , barcelona , maybe a chance of revenge , big revenge , on athletico madrid following the controversial defeat in 1997 .
whatever happens , today is historic .
the european tour was a novelty initially until city finished top of their group before defying the odds to make the last eight .
buffon and zidane have already expressed a view that they do n't want to face the foxes - they 're running scared already .
bring on the draw .
author: Ian Stringer
BBC Radio Leicester Foxes commentator

documents.title: watch : police investigate murder
text: this is the scene of a suspected murder in shepshed - police have cordoned off the area while they investigate
author: Helen McCarthy
BBC Radio Leicester Reporter

documents.title: car found 'crashed ' into wall
text: i 've just spoken to a man who claims to have called the emergency services last night when he found the injured man inside a car in shepshed .
he told me this was the wall the car appeared to have crashed into
police have said the driver 's fatal injuries were not consistent with a crash .
author: Helen McCarthy
BBC Radio Leicester Reporter

documents.title: charity under investigation
text: an investigation is underway into the financial management of the leicester charity bhaarat welfare trust .
the charity commission has said it has serious concerns over the way it 's run and has frozen its bank account .
this story first came to light seven months ago .

we were told the charity had been looking after £ 96,000 of donations for a dedicated hindu crematorium in the city but after a delay in finding a location the charity spent the money on their projects in india .
bhaarat welfare trust has always denied any wrongdoing and told us they are continuing to co-operate with the commission .
author: Sumeer Kalyani
Reporter, BBC East Midlands Today

documents.title: leicester city defender to miss rest of season
text: leicester city defender molla wague has been ruled out for the rest of the season with a dislocated shoulder .
the 26-year-old .
joined on loan from italian club udinese until may , .
with a view to a permanent deal , but was injured making his debut in the .
1-0 fa cup defeat by millwall in february .
city manager craig shakespeare told bbc radio leicester : `` our best wishes are with him .
it was freak incident .
`` he will be back and around the training ground , but wo n't be playing . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: policeman dies on duty in leicestershire
text: a leicestershire policeman died while on duty yesterday .
a crowdfunding page set up to raise money in austin jackson 's memory claims he was `` taken ill and suddenly passed away '' and leaves behind a wife and four children .
this was him ( back , middle ) delivering christmas presents to the elderly at the end of last year
the chief constable of leicestershire police has posted this message on twitter this morning
desperately sad news of austins 's untimely passing thoughts with his family , his team @ twitterid & his @ twitterid friends a good man
really sad news , my condolences to his family and my thoughts are with his team .
thank you
boss , my thoughts are with you all .
so very sorry for your loss .
@ twitterid
thank you
thanks
heartbreaking for his family and a terrible loss for the community
sorry to hear this # policefamily thoughts with you all
our thoughts are with you all at this sad time
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: champions league draw : leicester to find out last-eight opponents
text: leicester city will find out today who they will play in the quarter-finals of the champions league .
the premier league champions are the only english side left in the competition having enjoyed a stunning debut season in europe .
the draw for the last eight takes place in nyon , switzerland , from 11:00 gmt , with the europa league quarter-final draw to follow at 12:00 gmt .
manchester united are the only british team left in that tournament .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: leicester mercury front page
text: police have released the mugshot of the dangerous driver who killed two friends in an horrific crash in fosse road south , leicester .
author: Leicester Mercury

documents.title: suspected murder in shepshed
text: a murder investigation is underway in shepshed after a man was found fatally injured inside a car .
the vehicle looked as though it had crashed into a wall but when the emergency services arrived they found him to have injuries not consistent with a collision .
he was still alive when east midlands ambulance service arrived on gelders hall road just before 21:00 but he died at the scene .
he 's not yet been formally identified .
a 22-year-old man from the coalville has been arrested on sus of murder and is in police custody .
police said the scene is cordoned off this morning while forensic examinations take place .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live news coverage
text: happy friday leicestershire !
it 's an exciting day for the city - at 11:00 we 'll find out who leicester city will be playing in the quarter-finals of the champions league .
we 'll have coverage of the draw here on local live , as well as the rest of the day 's news , sport , weather and travel .
share you thoughts and reaction with us by email , facebook or twitter .
author: Amy Woodfield
BBC Local Live
